attributes.background: Brussels had chance to offer a fair deal. The EU is failing and trying to make it as hard as possible for us (UK) to leave, so other countries won't follow us out of the door. We had an empire once, conquered half the world with just sailing ships, we'll be ok. Also CANZUK awaits in the wings.
